Title: We Be Clownin'
Writer: Anders Holm, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam DeVine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Dominic Dierkes (story), Sean Clements (story), David Geberitt
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam DeVine, Anders Holm, Jillian Bell
Plot: The guys become children party clowns to pay for a pool slide.
